english.segment1: Looking down they're rising slowly. Veins that use to hide now showing. Blood that shows no sign of slowing. It's Your love inside me growing
english.segment2: Can You feel my heartbeat pumping. Can You feel my heartbeat pumping
english.segment3: It's rushing through my veins. A love I can't contain. My heart will soon give way. It's nothing I can fake. Your blood has sealed my fate. As my heart begins to break
english.segment4: Your love's breaking in my heart again. Your love activates adrenaline. Your love's shaking underneath my skin
english.segment5: My heart is beating through my chest. Will it explode let's take a guess. It's pumping harder every breath. This heartbeat started with a death
english.segment6: Can You feel my heartbeat pumping. Can You feel my heartbeat pumping
english.segment7: Can you hear it. Can you see it. Can you feel it. My heart it beats for you. It beats for love.
